```{r}
your_github_username <- "bobbidi0122"
your_practice_reponame <- "107-2-inclass-practice"

library(stringr)
str_replace_all(
  "https://api.github.com/repos/:owner/:repo/commits",
  c(
    ":owner"=your_github_username,
    ":repo"=your_practice_reponame
    )
  ) -> commitCheckStatement
```
